participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, enjoys expressing himself through music and food.
participant_1.background: I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy. I will continue to follow my passion and live my life to the fullest, even if others don't understand or approve. i play jazz piano in a band. i have never kissed a woman. i like to go out to eat.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and thoughtful, values relationships and enjoys sharing her love for baking with others.
participant_2.background: I treasure the watch my father gave me for my birthday because it is a reminder of our relationship. I baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year. i love to read and cook. I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well. since i have fibromyalgia, the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.

content.text: What are your hobbies?
I love to bake and read! What about you?
I play jazz piano in a band. I also enjoy going out to eat.
I love to eat out too! What are some of your favorite places to eat?
I love going to this Italian place by my house. The food is delicious and the service is great.
I love Italian food! I will have to check it out.
You should! It's called Tony's.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
What is your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make cakes. I think they're so much fun to decorate.
I love cakes too! I made a chocolate cake for my dad's birthday last week.
That sounds delicious! I love chocolate cake.
Me too! I'm glad he liked it.
I'm sure he did.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I also like to go to the movies.
I love going to the movies too! What is your favorite movie?
I have a lot of favorite movies, but I think my favorite is The Shawshank Redemption.
That's a great movie! I love Morgan Freeman's performance.
Me too! He's such a talented actor.
I agree. Do you have any other favorite actors?
Yes, I love Leonardo DiCaprio and Meryl Streep.
They're both amazing actors! I've seen a lot of their movies.
Me too! They're both so talented.
I agree
